name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Breaking news! Tonight, a recording was widely circulated in the local WeChat group in Shifang.
The title of the recording is "Publication Meeting on Epidemic Prevention (Shifang Middle School)"
In the video, a man conveyed a secret document issued by the central government to the students, saying that China is about to implement a new epidemic prevention model.
Preliminary experiments should be carried out in some places in Shifang, closed-loop management should be implemented, and a group immunity system should be quickly established.
The recording said that China's epidemic prevention will undergo major changes next.
Video 1

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Video 2
The recording said that the State Council published an article specifically introducing that the toxicity of Omicron is minimal to the human body
It is hoped that students will tell their parents not to be anxious or doubtful
It also said that Shifang Middle School will be a pioneer and hero in the process of making major changes to the national epidemic prevention policy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Video 3
The man in the video said that it is necessary to cross-infect and expand exchanges to build an immune barrier. China must do this, otherwise the national economy will be seriously affected and social security will be endangered.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Supplement, Xinhua News Agency News
At today's National Health Commission symposium, Vice Premier Sun Chunlan pointed out that with the weakening of the pathogenicity of the Omicron virus, the popularization of vaccination, and the accumulation of prevention and control experience, my country's epidemic prevention and control faces new situations and new tasks.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Supplement: In today's World Cup game, the audience's camera appeared again

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Hongdae, Seoul, South Korea

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Hello everyone, I need help.
There were many great live speeches from all over the world last night, but I didn't have time to sort them out because I was facing some things today.
If you can, please post them in the comments section so that everyone can hear more people's voices.
Thank you everyone

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In addition, her boyfriend posted

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: This afternoon in Dongguan, the property management of UCC Huanyu Huijin Center sealed the office building.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: This afternoon, some merchants in Xinfadi, Gaobeidian, Hebei Province, clashed with epidemic prevention personnel and overturned the protective fence with barbed wire.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: This afternoon, some merchants in Xinfadi, Gaobeidian, Hebei Province, clashed with epidemic prevention personnel and overturned the guardrail with barbed wire. Supplementary video

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizens submitted a video showing that someone in Chongqing hired a red-code person to mingle in the crowd and was discovered by the public and reported to the police. The red-code person confessed that the company hired him to move among the crowd at a salary of 200 yuan a day, and some nucleic acid testers were discovered after not doing nucleic acid for ten days.
Netizens said that there have been continuous positive findings in the area, and nucleic acid testing has been ongoing throughout the region.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added that it is free for people with yellow codes in Hangzhou to do nucleic acid tests at testing points, unless someone needs to go to the hospital to get a prescription for nucleic acid tests, which requires a fee of 4 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In addition, Renqiu City is a county-level city under the administration of Cangzhou, and the exact location of the square hospital is in Renqiu.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
In the Nintendo game "Splatoon 3"
Some players expressed their condolences and opinions in the square in the game.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Another Chongqing netizen added that the video incident happened about a week ago and because there have been many similar incidents in Chongqing, many people in Chongqing communities now refuse to go downstairs for nucleic acid testing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: During the day today, at Wangdingdi Yingshui Road in Nankai District, Tianjin, some people blocked the road to prevent the construction of a health station (square cabin) in a densely populated residential area in the city.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Today, in Yousheng Street Community, Pingdingshan City, Henan Province, within a few hours, people removed the iron sheets to demand the blockade to be lifted, and then it was sealed again, and then people removed the iron sheets again.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The original contributor added that the loudspeaker on site showed that the fee for the Hangzhou yellow code sampling test was 16 yuan, not 4 yuan, and many elderly people lined up in the snow.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Latest news
The community has been unsealed, and residents jokingly say they are "out of prison"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At around 2 o'clock this afternoon, a fire broke out in Fengming Huafu, Xi'an, Shaanxi.
The video shows that multiple households in a residential building were on fire. Firefighters have begun rescue work.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Supplementary images

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A netizen submitted a post saying that the earliest video was from 2:40 p.m., saying that the cause was the battery charging of the vehicle.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A student from Nanjing University of Media and Communication wrote in an article that the counselor said December is a sensitive month and the school is always monitoring people who try to circumvent the firewall. And everyone’s cell phone is being monitored in the background.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In recent days, residents in Majuqiao Town, Tongzhou District, Beijing have been asking for the lifting of the blockade.
Video 1 At 19:10 on the evening of December 1, the door of Beimenkou Village in Majuqiao Town began to be pried open.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Video 2 In the evening of November 30, workers from Dagezhuang Village, Majuqiao Town, Tongzhou District, Beijing, gathered to protest against the blockade.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Video 3: Erjie Village, Majuqiao Town, Tongzhou District, Beijing was sealed off on November 29. During the day on November 30, residents demanded that the seal be lifted

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some netizens said that Guilin University of Electronic Technology notified yesterday that nucleic acid tests would not be conducted on December 1. As a result, they found out today that their health code had been tested for nucleic acid multiple times around 3 pm.
And many students who went home also found out that they had been tested for nucleic acid five or six times today.

Many places have suspended IELTS exams again.

Due to the out-of-control epidemic, the mine area completely stopped production and life order was paralyzed. Due to the huge pressure, the mine manager jumped off the building

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Thank you for taking the time to do this and to all the people who spend time on it . 
Please note that my message may contain errors and I am personally responsible for all misinformation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Xi'an police issued a police report that five people died after failed rescue efforts, and the vital signs of the other three were stable. It was initially estimated that the burned area was about 25 square meters, and the cause of the fire was under investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Supplement: This is not my account, and I don’t know them.
The account promised me that it would only forward my content and translate my descriptions.
Therefore, please supervise me. If there are errors, exaggerated descriptions, and inflammatory remarks beyond the scope of translation, please be vigilant and contact me.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of December 1, some students from Yicheng No. 1 Middle School in Hubei Province had problems with nucleic acid tests and were taken to centralized isolation.
This led to some parents coming to the city government and kneeling down to demand that their children be taken back.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Parents had an argument with epidemic prevention personnel
